DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Europe . The aim study investigate total exposure NN5401 ( insulin degludec/insulin aspart ) child , adolescent adult subject type 1 diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: A Trial Investigating Total Exposure NN5401 ( Insulin Degludec/Insulin Aspart ) Children , Adolescents Adult Subjects With Type 1 Diabetes
DOC.mesh_term: Insulin degludec , insulin aspart drug combination
DOC.criteria: Type 1 diabetes mellitus ( diagnose clinically ) least 12 month Body mass index child : 15.020.0 kg/m^2 ( inclusive ) , adolescent : 18.028.0 kg/m^2 ( inclusive ) adult maximum 30.0 kg/m^2 Subject donate blood plasma past month , 500 mL within 3 month prior screen Not able willing refrain smoking inpatient period Female childbearing potential pregnant , breastfeed intend become pregnant use adequate contraceptive method
